descriptions.home: Latest news, breaking stories, and in-depth analysis from around the world. Stay informed with our comprehensive coverage of politics, technology, business, and more.

descriptions.topics: Explore news by topics and categories

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordMustHaveUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordMustHaveLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordMustHaveNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordMustHaveSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
validation.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character (@$!%*?&)
validation.slugValidation: Slug must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.selectAtLeastOneLanguage: Select at least one language to translate to
validation.atLeastOne: Provide at least one field to update
validation.confirmDeleteArticle: Are you sure you want to delete this {{entity}}? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the {{entity}} from the system.
